meanings.sent1: After the fire, the church underwent multiple reconsecrations to restore its sacredness.
meanings.sent2: The reconsecrations of the ancient temple brought a sense of peace to the community.
meanings.sent3: The reconsecrations of the old library made the books feel extra special.
meanings.sent4: The reconsecrations of the land turned it into a place of spiritual renewal.
meanings.sent5: The reconsecrations of the artifacts were done with great care and reverence.

meanings.definition: The state of being consecrated again.
meanings.sent1: The reconsecrations of the temple were celebrated with joyous ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: The reconsecrations of the sacred ground brought a sense of purity to the area.
meanings.sent3: The reconsecrations of the garden made the flowers bloom brighter than ever.
meanings.sent4: The reconsecrations of the monument symbolized a new beginning for the town.
meanings.sent5: The reconsecrations of the church filled the air with a sense of divine presence.
